Text: why dont no=one seed this is it not worth the effort most be broken

this will take forever, because everytime someone completes the download they dont seed back. watch the number of peers go down but no one stays & seeds! this is a sign that the system isnt working and its going to fail if this continues!

Ive downloaded a 65 g download that took less time than this. I was watching the peer/seed count and I finally got a seed in my area It was up on the screen for only 3 minutes than it was gone. So I guess the way this works is as soon as your download is complete turn it off. which is totally differant than what I was doing what I was doing was I would leave it seed until the ratio was at least 1.0000. Will any of the 200+ peers be cool enough to turn into a seed.
